item.title: Free design templates
item.description:
For those developers who can’t design very well (like myself), here is a link to a free design site:

OpenWebDesign.com

OpenSourceWebDesign.com (Older Version, More templates)

The popular list has some good ones and they are mainly CSS driven layouts.Â  Very cool.
